title: Dayton Aviation Heritage National Historical Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       Dayton Aviation Heritage National Historical Park is a five-unit park located in and around Dayton, Ohio.   The Wright Cycle Company Complex  The Wright-Dunbar Interpretive Center Aviation Trail, Inc. Visitor Center and Museum The Wright Cycle Company building  16 South Williams Street, Dayton, OH 45402 Main phone #: (937) 225-7705 Hours of Operation:   9:00 am to 5:00 pm, Every Day  Closed: Thanksgiving, Christmas Day, and New Year's Day. During inclement weather, Dayton Aviation Heritage National Historical Park follows the opening/closure decisions of Wright-Patterson Air Force Base. For up to date operating status information during inclement weather, visit the WPAFB Operating Status page. This information is updated daily. You can also call (937) 225-7705 for more information.          Huffman Prairie Flying Field Interpretive Center  2380 Memorial Road, Wright-Patterson AFB, OH 45433 Main phone #: (937) 425-0008 Hours of Operation:    9:00 am to 5:00 pm, Every Day  Closed: Thanksgiving, Christmas Day, and New Year's Day.  During inclement weather, Dayton Aviation Heritage National Historical Park follows the opening/closure decisions of Wright-Patterson Air Force Base. For up to date operating status information during inclement weather, visit the WPAFB Operating Status page. This information is updated daily. You can also call (937) 225-7705 for more information.           Dayton History at Carillon Historical Park  1000 Carillon Boulevard, Dayton, OH 45409 Phone #: (937) 293-2841 Hours of Operation:    9:30 am to 5:00 pm Monday through Saturday 12:00 noon to 5:00 pm Sunday  Closed: Thanksgiving, December 24 & 25 and New Year's Eve and New Year's Day.          Paul Laurence Dunbar House Historic Site   219 North Paul Laurence Dunbar Street, Dayton, OH 45401 Hours of Operation:  10:00 am to 4:00 pm Friday, Saturday and Sunday Closed Monday through Thursday  Closed: Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Day, and New Year's Day. Last tour begins at 3:30 pm.  For more information call (937) 225-7005, ext. 224 or email the site.         Hawthorn Hill  For more information and tour reservations, contact Dayton History at Carillon Historical Park at (937) 313-2010
